div3.head: Overview
div3.p: &commentNode;s encapsulate XML comments. Comments have the following properties:

item.p: The string -- must not occur within the &dm.prop.content;.
The character - must not occur as the last character of the &dm.prop.content;.

def.p: If the comment has a parent, returns the value of the base-uri of its parent; otherwise, returns the empty sequence.
Returns the value of the &dm.prop.parent; property.
Returns the value of the &dm.prop.content; property.
Returns the value of the &dm.prop.content; property as a xs:string.

div3.head: Construction from an Infoset
div3.p: The comment information items are optional.
A &commentNode; is constructed for each comment information item.
The following infoset properties are required: content and parent.
&commentNode; properties are derived from the infoset as follows:

def.p: The value of the content property.
The node corresponding to the value of the parent property.

div3.p: There are no &commentNode;s for comments that are children of a document type declaration information item.

div3.head: Construction from a PSVI
div3.p: Construction from a PSVI is identical to construction from the Infoset.

div3.head: Infoset Mapping
div3.p: A &commentNode; maps to a comment information item.
The following properties are specified by this mapping:

item.p: If this node is the root of the infoset mapping operation, unknown.
If this node has a parent, the information item that corresponds to the node returned by parent.
